snippet.title: The Kings Crusade New Allies DLC Trailer
snippet.description:
Webpage: http://www.thekingscrusade.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/thekingscrusade
Twitter: http://twitter.com/thekingscrusade 
Forum:  http://forum.paradoxplaza.com

New Allies DLC is released for The Kings' Crusade.  In addition to a new set of characters, the price of this beloved real-time strategy thriller features a new, lower price tag of $29.99/€29.99.
  
Add an unexpected hero to your stable of noble men with the worthy additions of Lancelot, Joan d' Arc or Arthur of Brittany.  Explore their special strengths and skills to defeat your arch nemesis.  Utilize the Ayyubid Bowmen for their infamous speed or the Gascon Knights for the might of their swords.  Whether playing as Saracen or Lionheart, you will discover the right combination of allies to find victory in your battle. 

From the development team that created King Arthur and Crusaders: Thy Kingdom Come, this real-time strategy game places you in the era of the Third Crusade, spanning the years 1189-1192. Choose your historically accurate heroes and units or choose to add mythical characters and units to enhance and diversify The Kings´ Crusade gameplay experience. 

Are you born to command the world?
Command archers, ballistas, footmen and mounted knights with superior tactics to defeat your foe. 
The crowned heads of Europe have launched a new military campaign to reconquer the Holy Land.
The time has come for you to assemble your armies and take back the land as Richard the Lionheart, or to assume the role of  the great Saladin and defend your people against the oncoming invasion. 
Control and upgrade the leaders and their armies and lead your men into fierce battles in this real-time strategy game that places you in the era of the Third Crusade.

Features
■Play through two single-player campaigns -- Crusader and Saracen.
■Oversee hundreds of soldiers in real-time epic battles.
■Command your forces, conquer territory, and expand your realm on a fully 3D map.
■Strategically manage your army between missions.
■Rewrite the past with famous historical characters serving as the main heroes.
